Name: GLOBE DRONE
About the game: GLOBE DRONE is an Earth Simulation. You can Fly Anywhere You want. Also, You can FAST TRAVEL To . . . Boston Grand Canyon Denver Paris San Francisco Melbourne Philadelphia Crater Lake MT Fuji Then You can Use the Mouse/Keyboard OR Gamepad to Fly around with the Drone. Also, in Melbourne there is a Fun Easter Egg Hunt Mini-Game. HINTS/TIPS : *** IMPORTANT : You must have a Constant, Fast & Stable Internet Connection in order for the Global Content Data System to Work ! *** You can Fly Out into Space to see the whole Earth at once. SPEED UP = Gamepad Right Shoulder / Mouse Wheel UP SLOW DOWN = Gamepad Left Shoulder / Mouse Wheel Down You can only 'See' on the Sunny Side of the Earth, some Cities are set at different Times of Day. Trying to Find Your House or another Place of Interest ? Try going to Philadelphia (It has Street Markers) and then Zoom/Fly out to Space and Zoom back into Your Location. If the Location You are Looking for is on the Dark Side of the Earth, then try ' FAST Travel ' to another City to see if it is Near Your Area. You can go anywhere You want in this Educational Earth Simulation.
